org.gbif.occurrencestore.persistence.api

Interface FragmentPersistenceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FragmentPersistenceServiceImpl

    public interface FragmentPersistenceService
    A service for writing and retrieving Fragments.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Fragment get(Integer key)
      Get the Fragment with the given key.
      FragmentCreationResult insert(Fragment fragment, Set<UniqueIdentifier> uniqueIds)
      Insert a new Fragment, given its UniqueIdentifiers, generating a key for it in the process.
      void update(Fragment fragment)
      Update an existing Fragment.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Fragment get(Integer key)
        Get the Fragment with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the fragment (Integer rather than int for use in methods/classes using generic types)
        Returns:
        the Fragment
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails

      • insert

        FragmentCreationResult insert(Fragment fragment,
                            Set<UniqueIdentifier> uniqueIds)
        Insert a new Fragment, given its UniqueIdentifiers, generating a key for it in the process.
        Parameters:
        fragment - to be persisted
        uniqueIds - the set of UniqueIdentifiers that identify this fragment
        Returns:
        the FragmentCreationResult with the Fragment's key set
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if fragment's key field is not null or uniqueIds is empty
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails

      • update

        void update(Fragment fragment)
        Update an existing Fragment.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the Fragment to update
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if fragment's key field is null
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails
